title: process pdf file and extract questions
description: Test the POST /api/process-pdf endpoint to ensure it correctly processes a valid PDF file, extracts multiple choice questions using OCR and AI, and returns the expected success response with accurate counts of questions extracted and stored.

title: handle invalid pdf file upload
description: Test the POST /api/process-pdf endpoint with invalid inputs such as non-PDF files, files larger than 50MB, or missing required fields to verify that the API returns appropriate 400 error responses with clear error messages.

title: get pdf processing status successfully
description: Test the GET /api/process-pdf endpoint with valid pdfId and userId query parameters to verify that it returns the current processing status, total questions extracted, and timestamps correctly in a successful 200 response.

title: handle missing parameters in status request
description: Test the GET /api/process-pdf endpoint with missing pdfId or userId parameters to ensure the API returns a 400 error indicating missing parameters.

title: handle non existent pdf in status request
description: Test the GET /api/process-pdf endpoint with a pdfId that does not exist in the system to verify that it returns a 404 error indicating the PDF was not found.
